name: Spire of Sorcery: Prologue
description: Spire of Sorcery is created by Charlie Oscar. This is our team’s second big release. Earlier, we shipped the native digital board game Gremlins, Inc.. Working together for the last seven years, we aim to create original games that reward players with new experiences!
developers: Charlie Oscar Lima Tango Interactive Entertainment
publishers: Charlie Oscar Lima Tango Interactive Entertainment
